import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Card = ({ img, name, num, id, types, nextEvolution, height, weight, weaknesses}) => { const [show, toggleShow] = useState(false); return ( <> toggleShow(!show)}> {num} {name} {!types[1] ? types[0] : types[0] + ', ' + types[1]} {show ? 'Less -' : 'More +'} { show &&

More info

} ) } export default Card
